TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is an NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , Mr PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant was arrested by NORP police , without a warrant , on NORP territory , on DATE . He alleges that he was pushed into the boot of a car and transported to GPE , where he was charged with robbery and smuggling . He also alleges that he was subjected to torture and degrading treatment during detention . He was detained on remand until DATE , when ORG acquitted him .
The applicant brought an action against ORG seeking payment of compensation for non - pecuniary damage arising from the unlawful investigation and his detention on remand for DATE .
On DATE the ORG ruled in favour of the applicant and awarded him CARDINAL NORP lei ( MDL ) ( the equivalent of MONEY ( ORG ) at the time ) . ORG appealed .
On DATE ORG dismissed the ORG ’s appeal and the latter lodged an appeal in cassation with ORG .
By a final judgment of DATE ORG upheld the appeal in cassation and reduced the amount of compensation to MDL CARDINAL ( EUR CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL ) .
On DATE the Deputy Prosecutor General lodged with ORG a request for annulment of the above - mentioned judgments and for a reduction in the amount of damages .

On DATE ORG upheld the Deputy Prosecutor General ’s request for annulment and quashed the above - mentioned judgments . ORG adopted a new judgment and awarded the applicant MDL CARDINAL,CARDINAL ( EUR CARDINAL.CARDINAL at the time ) in compensation for unlawful detention .

On DATE the Government informed the ORG that , following the re - opening of the proceedings , on DATE , ORG ruled in favour of the applicant and awarded him MDL CARDINAL ( ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL at the time ) in compensation for non - pecuniary damage as a result of his unlawful detention . It also found that there had been a breach of the applicant ’s rights under LAW and LAW No . CARDINAL to the Convention as a result of the quashing of the judgment of ORG of DATE . ORG awarded him MDL CARDINAL ( EUR CARDINAL at the time ) in compensation for pecuniary damage suffered as a result of his unlawful detention , MDL CARDINAL ( ORG CARDINAL at the time ) for non - pecuniary damage suffered as a result of the violation of the applicant ’s rights under the Convention and MDL CARDINAL ( ORG CARDINAL.CARDINAL at the time ) for costs and expenses , including the applicant ’s representative ’s fees incurred before the ORG .
The relevant domestic law was set out in PERSON v. GPE , no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE .
